quotes.quote: But the fact that some geniuses were laughed at does not imply that all who are laughed at are geniuses. They laughed at Columbus, they laughed at Fulton, they laughed at the Wright brothers. But they also laughed at Bozo the Clown.
quotes.author: Carl Sagan

quotes.quote: Everyone is born with genius, but most people only keep it a few minutes.
quotes.author: Edgard Varese

quotes.quote: Genius may have its limitations, but stupidity is not thus handicapped.
quotes.author: Elbert Hubbard

quotes.quote: Genius hath electric power which earth can never tame.
quotes.author: Lydia M. Child

quotes.quote: There's a fine line between genius and insanity. I have erased this line.
quotes.author: Oscar Levant

quotes.quote: The public is wonderfully tolerant. It forgives everything except genius.
quotes.author: Oscar Wilde

quotes.quote: He was a genius - that is to say, a man who does superlatively and without obvious effort something that most people cannot do by the uttermost exertion of their abilities.
quotes.author: Robertson Davies

quotes.quote: Genius might be described as a supreme capacity for getting its possessors into trouble of all kinds.
quotes.author: Samuel Butler

quotes.quote: There is no great genius without some touch of madness.
quotes.author: Seneca

quotes.quote: Mediocrity knows nothing higher than itself, but talent instantly recognizes genius.
quotes.author: Sir Arthur Conan Doyle

quotes.quote: Genius is one per cent inspiration, ninety-nine per cent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Genius is one percent inspiration, ninety-nine percent perspiration.
quotes.author: Thomas A. Edison

quotes.quote: Men of genius do not excel in any profession because they labor in it, but they labor in it because they excel.
quotes.author: William Hazlitt
